testcase.description: Pre-Condition: - Create an account on GM, including username, password and expiration time - Include auth and register mode Test Procedure: 1:Configure passthrough cwp on ap, and configure one ethernet port bridge (access or 8021q) mode, enable mac-learning, bind passthrough cwp to the bridge ethernet port 2:Client links to ap through the bridge ethernet port or switch, result 1 3:Client requests a web page, result 2 4:Client enters an in valid username and password or doesnâ€™t fill all mandatory fields, result 3

step.ssh: -v "security-object cwp" -v "security-object cwp security aaa radius-server primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object cwp security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal auth-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object cwp security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal pass-through vlan 1" -v "security-object cwp web-server" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "interface eth1 security-object cwp" -v "user-profile 1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1"

step.desc: ifconfig to show the ip adrr

step.telnet: -v "_debug auth all" -v "_debug cgic all" -v "clear log b"

step.desc: client request a web page and get login page,input incorrect username and password
step.script: export PYTHONPATH=${auto.root.dir}; python ${auto.root.dir}/AerohiveGUI/scripts/cwp/cwp_login.py -r http://${ap1.bpc.mif.ip}:4444/wd/hub --parameters visit.url=${url} login.username=wrong login.password=${pub.radius1.passwd} login.is_success=false -t ff -l info -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.log-match: -c -i "radius server reject this user in station ${sta1.tif.mac}"
